verbose_text: Consequently, a fully human IgG1 mAb (LST-007) targeting Pseudomonas aeruginosa (PA) flagellin type b was recombinantly expressed and characterized in vitro and in an infection model driven by a multidrug resistant (MDR) PA strain.
evidence: LST-007) targeting Pseudomonas aeruginosa (PA) flagellin type b was recombinantly expressed
